params.name: encoder_hidden_sizes
params.description: The number of channels in each convolutional layer in the encoder.

params.name: decoder_hidden_size
params.description: The hidden size of the decoder.

params.name: keypoint_decoder_dim
params.description: The output dimension of the keypoint decoder.

params.name: descriptor_decoder_dim
params.description: The output dimension of the descriptor decoder.

params.name: keypoint_threshold
params.description: The threshold to use for extracting keypoints.

params.name: max_keypoints
params.description: The maximum number of keypoints to extract. If -1, will extract all keypoints.

params.name: border_removal_distance
params.description: The distance from the border to remove keypoints.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.
